category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: MPP_ToolActivity_EnableUserData
preference.preference_description: Synchronize customizable attributes between NX-CAM and Teamcenter. Up to 15 custom properties can be defined that are stored with the MENCToolActivity of a CAM setup. These custom attributes are defined using the preference MPP_ToolActivity_CustomUserData.
